unalcol.types.real.matrix

Class DoubleMatrixUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.types.real.matrix.DoubleMatrixUtil

  • public class DoubleMatrixUtil
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: DoubleMatrixUtil

    Description: A set of constants and methods operating on a matrix of double numbers.

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2009

    Company: Kunsamu

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jonatan Gomez Perdomo
